name: Type Hero Adventures
description:
#ludumdare41

Commands:

Type the action that you want to do, and then press "Enter" on the keyboard.

ACTIONS:

  • right: walk to the right
  • left: walk to the left
  • turn: turn to opposite direction
  • stop: stop the character
  • jump: literally jump
  • down: crouch
  • stand: get up
  • restart: restart the stage
